snippet: The latest scandal involves a gossipy, big-haired puppet in Puerto Rico, known as La Comay, who has become one of the island’s most controversial, and most watched, media figures.
abstract: Spanish-language celebrity gossip show SuperXclusivo, broadcast in Puerto Rico but also on mainland,  becomes engulfed in scandal after segment in which its controversial puppet character, La Comay, made offensive comments about brutal murder of publicist; remarks draw widespread protests and boycott calls against network, but show's ratings have continued to climb.
lead_paragraph: The latest scandal involves a gossipy, big-haired puppet in Puerto Rico, known as La Comay, who has become one of the island’s most controversial, and most watched, media figures.

headline.seo: La Comay of ‘SuperXclusivo’ Stirs Anger Over Comments on Man’s Death
headline.main: Commenting on a Death Gets a Puppet in Trouble
headline.print_headline: Commenting on a Death Gets a Puppet in Trouble
